Articles.Content: Would prefer a kerbokaur DIDN'T invade the Mun, but in saying that, I am no match for the authority of CarolRawley... I just won't be visiting it at all.

This inspires my new Doodad!

The MunMagnet

You no go to Mun,

Mun come to you!
Can it be deactivated if I notice a kerbokaur on the surface?
abort program for sissies. sissies be launched out of catapult into Kordor.
I'd rather face a quick death of wham than a long painful death of omnomnom.
I be posting biology of Kerbokaur soon.
if by pet you mean evil world destroying extinctionist demons that should be exterminated, yes.
Brilliant. I wish wish pre order 4.3 of them. Make sure they are all female please.

sorry, all kerbokaurs are unisexual.

And 0.3 of one?

What part?

In that case I'll just take

one billion trillion

They will make a perfect army. Even though I can't control them.

That will take over planet! Umad? Kerbokaurs reproduce and lay egg every 2 days.

Any way a bump back on topic, please. Don't worry, jgiscool, there will be a thread just for talking about Kerbokaurs.
